name: Zipongo
overview:
Zipongo’s mission is to empower healthy living that’s convenient, affordable and enjoyed with friends and family. Zipongo teams up with health payors, national retailers and care providers to help people buy healthier foods and drive measurable health outcomes.

Zipongo’s website and mobile phone app offer members discounts on healthy food products. Members are rewarded when they “Share the Health™” and pass along Healthy Deals to their friends and family. Members are also rewarded for building healthy habits and staying loyal to healthy products over time. Zipongo is free to use.

Coming soon, Zipongo’s Healthy Deals will be available throughout the U.S. Zipongo will also soon be providing members with personalized healthy plans, based on each individual’s (and his/her family’s) unique health needs, lifestyles, and preferences. These plans will include personalized recommendations for healthy food products, as well as recommendations for how to cook and enjoy healthy foods.

funding_rounds.source_description: With $1M+ From Guitar Hero Co-founder & Others, Zipongo Is Building The Mint.com For Healthy Living
